featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hello Vanessa:

We are sorry to hear that your recent visit was less than wonderful.

Being an Adult Oriented Business (SOB) comes with many responsibilities, one of which is assuring that no minors are allowed access to our facilities.  Our staff are instructed to request ID for any customer who appears to be under 30 years old so that we can assure that we are in full compliance with this very important requirement.

We understand you concerns for your private information and please feel free to block out the address when presenting your ID.  Our staff simply need to verify the picture is actually you and the date of birth to determine that you are over the accepted age.

We hope that you will choose to come and shop with us again.  We value your feedback, your business, and your time.

Thank you.

featured_reviews.review_id: Shopped 3 time at this location and never had and issue until recently. My friend and me went in and was approached by a  lady with dark hair and light color skin tone. She asked to see our ID'S and then told us we were good. I turn to look at an item on A display and then she asked to confiscate my lounge fly mini bag purse to put behind the counter. "She then explains that they had alot of thief and then corrected herself by saying "not to say you will steal" I then told her that I will put my purse in the car. By the way she didn't bat and eye about my friends shoulder purse which could carry a whole laptop but who I'm to tell a different in size. After awhile of shopping my friend taps my shoulder and points to a couple who enters the store. The lady checks there IDS but said nothing about there bags. The man had a whole black backpack and his friend had a lounge fly bag.  the same size as mine. At that point I realized it was a race thing. I was ready to put my item of purchase down and just leave the store. But I realized by saying nothing I was allowing her behavior to be acceptable. Well not today so, i address the problem with her boss standing on the other side. I simply asked why are those customers bags acceptable but not my? She then tells me that my bag was bigger. My friend tells her that the bag is the same brand as the other females and that they are the same size. if size was the problem why is the gentleman  school backpack acceptable? She then back tracks and trys to find another excuse but couldn't think of one. I tell her" You need to give everyone the same treatment because right now you look like a racist." She does not deny what is said and then walks off. Needless to say i will not be returning and will be spreading the word.

featured_reviews.review_translated_text: Bu yerden 3 kez alisveris yaptim ve yakin zamana kadar hic sorun yasamadim. Arkadasim ve ben iceri girdik ve yanimiza koyu sacli ve acik ten rengine sahip bir bayan yaklasti. Kimliklerimizi gormek istedi ve iyi oldugumuzu soyledi. A ekranindaki bir urune bakmak icin dondum ve ardindan tezgahin arkasina koymak icin mini canta cantama el koymami istedi. "Daha sonra cok fazla hirsizlik yaptiklarini anlatti ve 'calacaksin deme' diyerek kendini duzeltti. Ben de ona cantami arabaya koyacagimi soyledim. Bu arada bana goz acip kapayincaya kadar bakmadi. arkadasimin omuz cantasi butun bir dizustu bilgisayari tasiyabilecek ama ben kime farkli boyutta oldugunu soyleyeyim. Bir sure alisveris yaptiktan sonra arkadasim omzuma dokunuyor ve magazaya giren bir cifti isaret ediyor. Bayan orada kimlikleri kontrol ediyor ama orasi hakkinda hicbir sey soylemedi. cantalar. Adamin tamamen siyah bir sirt cantasi vardi ve arkadasinin da benimkiyle ayni buyuklukte bir ucus cantasi vardi. O noktada bunun bir yaris meselesi oldugunu fark ettim. Satin aldigim urunu yere birakip magazadan ayrilmaya hazirdim. . Ama hicbir sey soylemedigimde onun davranisinin kabul edilebilir olmasina izin verdigimi fark ettim. Eh, bugun degil, diger tarafta patronunun durmasiyla sorunu ele aliyorum. Sadece bu musterilerin cantalari neden kabul edilebilir ama benim degil? diye sordum. Sonra soyle dedi: Benim cantam daha buyuktu, arkadasim cantanin diger kadinlarla ayni marka oldugunu ve ayni boyda olduklarini soyledi. Eger sorun boyutsa, beyefendinin okul cantasi neden kabul edilebilir? Daha sonra geri doner ve baska bir bahane bulmaya calisir, ancak aklina bir tane gelmez. Ona "Herkese ayni muameleyi yapman lazim cunku su anda irkci gibi gorunuyorsun" diyorum. Soylenenleri inkar etmiyor ve sonra cekip gidiyor. Geri donmeyecegimi ve haberi yayacagimi soylemeye gerek yok.

Once again, the customer service at this location has exceeded my expectations. I went to the store last night to buy 2 items. While speaking to a store employee whose name is Cheyenne about a few things, I was  intrigued at her overall knowledge and expertise and listened to some of her suggestions that made sense in the moment, and I ended up buying a small bagfull of items (8). She listened to everything I had to say without passing judgment and helped me select what was best for me. I made a few jokes to break the ice that really didn't need breaking as we were direct and in tune with the subject matter at hand.

P.S - I had a bunch of point to use and she further explained the Monday promotional discount to get the most out of my purchase. I love saving $ and last night was a perfect example of that.

Thanxxx

featured_reviews.review_id:
A nice selection but I do not recommend- if you have ANY problem with a product, they will not help you. Other stores will handle warranty claims through the manufacturer for you, and this one will not - good luck filing one yourself because you did not purchase direct from the manufacturer.

Additionally, they do not check their items before selling them. I had the pleasure of purchasing an item I trusted to be brand new, but got home to find it was damaged when it was sold to me. The store will not offer any refund, discount, exchange, or return.

Also beware of high product markup! The broken item I purchased was $70 and turns out it is only $30 direct from the manufacturer's website.

Go support a different local store that actually has customer service!

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Ms. Thomas: 
We apologize that the purchased product did not satisfy your expectations.  Our team is dedicated to providing excellent customer service and we strive for 100% of satisfied customers.  Due to store policy, all sales are final once the product leaves the store.  We have a no return policy posted in the store and it is also printed on the purchase receipt. Due to health and safety of all customers, we do not handle products that are boxed and sanitary when received by our vendors. We also invite you to contact the manufacturer of the product as they will honor the warranty with a paid receipt.  Thank you.
featured_reviews.review_translated_text:
Guzel bir secim ama tavsiye etmiyorum; bir urunle ilgili HERHANGI bir sorun yasarsaniz, size yardimci olmazlar. Diger magazalar, garanti taleplerini sizin icin uretici araciligiyla halledecektir ve bu durum bunu yapmayacaktir; dogrudan ureticiden satin almadiginiz icin kendiniz bir garanti talebinde bulunurken iyi sanslar.

Ayrica urunlerini satmadan once kontrol etmiyorlar. Yepyeni olduguna guvendigim bir urunu satin almanin mutlulugunu yasadim, ancak eve geldigimde bana satildiginda hasarli oldugunu gordum. Magaza herhangi bir geri odeme, indirim, degisim veya iade sunmayacaktir.

Ayrica yuksek urun isaretlemesine de dikkat edin! Satin aldigim kirik urun 70 dolardi ve bunun dogrudan ureticinin web sitesinden yalnizca 30 dolar oldugu ortaya cikti.

Musteri hizmetlerine sahip farkli bir yerel magazayi destekleyin!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text:
Sayin Bayan Thomas:
Satin aldiginiz urunun beklentilerinizi karsilamamasindan dolayi ozur dileriz. Ekibimiz mukemmel musteri hizmeti sunmaya kendini adamistir ve %100 memnun musteriler icin cabaliyoruz. Magaza politikasi geregi tum satislar, urun magazadan ciktiktan sonra kesinlesir. Magazada iade yasagi politikamiz bulunmaktadir ve bu politika ayni zamanda satin alma makbuzuna da basilmistir. Tum musterilerimizin sagligi ve guvenligi acisindan, saticilarimiza teslim edilen, kutulu ve hijyenik urunlerle islem yapmiyoruz. Ayrica, garantiyi ucretli bir makbuzla yerine getirecekleri icin sizi urunun ureticisiyle iletisime gecmeye davet ediyoruz. Tesekkur ederim.

featured_reviews.review_id: I found this shop sometime last year and seeing it was women owned it encouraged my girlfriend and I to go. We were really nervous since it was our first time stepping our of comfort zone like this. There we met Alyssa and she helped us find what we needed while also making the experience less overwhelming. The way she talked to us about everything made it feel more normal and comfortable to be open about. Since then we've made this our go-to shop. We had been visiting the location on Babcock but recently I visited the potranco location on my own and again I was super nervous. However not even 5 minutes after being there my nerves were calmed when Alyssa began to suggest new things based on my curiosities I had expressed. I walked out satisfied and confident with what I picked out and honestly never thought I'd feel so comfortable going to a shop with my partner and by myself. I'm grateful to have a wonderful experience every visit and knowing I can ask any questions without feeling like it's stupid or a bother. 10/10 will strongly recommend you visiting either of these locations and will recommend to anyone I know!!!

featured_reviews.review_translated_text: Gecen yil bu dukkani buldum ve kadinlara ait oldugunu gorunce kiz arkadasimi ve beni gitmeye tesvik etti. Ilk defa konfor alanimiza bu sekilde adim atacagimiz icin gercekten gergindik. Orada Alyssa'yla tanistik ve o hem ihtiyacimiz olani bulmamiza yardimci oldu, hem de deneyimi daha az bunaltici hale getirdi. Bizimle her sey hakkinda konusma sekli, acik olmanin daha normal ve rahat hissettirmesini sagladi. O zamandan beri burayi favori magazamiz haline getirdik. Babcock'taki yeri ziyaret ediyorduk ama yakin zamanda potranco yerini kendi basima ziyaret ettim ve yine cok gergindim. Ancak oraya vardiktan 5 dakika sonra bile Alyssa'nin dile getirdigim meraklarima dayanarak yeni seyler onermeye baslamasiyla sinirlerim yatisti. Sectiklerimden tatmin olmus ve kendimden emin bir sekilde oradan ayrildim ve durust olmak gerekirse, esimle ve tek basima bir magazaya giderken bu kadar rahat hissedecegimi hic dusunmemistim. Her ziyaretimde harika bir deneyim yasadigim icin minnettarim ve aptalca ya da rahatsiz edici bir seymis gibi hissetmeden her turlu soruyu sorabilecegimi bildigim icin minnettarim. 10/10, bu yerlerden herhangi birini ziyaret etmenizi siddetle tavsiye edecek ve tanidigim herkese tavsiye edecek!!!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Derecelendirmenizi bizimle paylasmak icin zaman ayirdiginiz icin gercekten minnettariz ve tesekkur ederiz.

This is probably one of the most comfortable places I've ever shopped. All the ladies that helped us were fantastic at making us comfortable and knowledgeable in our purchases. I would give 5 stars if only the clothes were more size inclusive. I desperately wanted something cute but the highest size I could find was a 2x and it was only one item. Now for those wondering about price. I paid $127 for multiple products. I paid that for one vibe elsewhere. The quality was still very good on all the products.

featured_reviews.review_translated_text:
Burasi muhtemelen alisveris yaptigim en rahat yerlerden biri. Bize yardimci olan tum hanimlar, alisverislerimizde bizi rahat ve bilgili kilmak konusunda harikaydilar. Sadece kiyafetler daha buyuk bedenler dahil olsaydi 5 yildiz verirdim. Caresizce sevimli bir sey istedim ama bulabildigim en buyuk boyut 2x'ti ve sadece bir parcaydi. Sadece hizmete ve mekanin ne kadar rahat olduguna dayanarak kesinlikle geri donecegim.
Simdi fiyatini merak edenler icin. Birden fazla urune 127$ odedim. Bunu baska bir yerde bir titresim icin odedim. Tum urunlerde kalite hala cok iyiydi.

Beden kapsayiciligi konusunda su anda 3XL/4XL'e kadar cesitli parcalar tasiyoruz. Bizi bir kez daha ziyaret etmekten cekinmeyin ve size su anda stoklarimizda bulunanlari gostermekten buyuk mutluluk duyariz. Ayrica sonbahar/tatil koleksiyonumuz icin bizi takip etmeye devam edin, magazada ve internette gercekten sevimli parcalar olacak!
